column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I'm giving Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba full points for the originality of tapas for brunch and the vibe there is so cool (I love the wall of bread)
column2: but some of the food was hit of miss. The sausage fried paella rice was super bland and the pancakes were just so-so
column3: but the French toast (especially the butter) blew me away
column4: and I usually never order a sweet option at brunch.
